PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2005-14272005-08-29,  ,  HERITAGE,  , 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of SONIA GAAL of Orleans, Ontario, to be a full-time permanent member of the Public Service Staffing Tribunal to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years; and designation of SONIA GAAL to be Vice-Chairperson of the Public Service Staffing Tribunal; effective September 2, 2005.
